title: Registration Opening
description: Bashaway 2023 registration opens. This is where your code will become a masterpiece. Get a team of capable members who are well-versed with Bash or any other Scripting Language so you are one step closer to victory. Make sure to register your team and secure your spot..

title: Workshops
description: Donâ€™t miss out on the well-worth hands-on training session which can enhance your scripting skills. This assuredly is a great opportunity to polish your already existing skills or learn new ones.

title: Registration Closing
description: Registrations for SLIIT Bashaway 2023 closes soon. No registrations will be accepted after this date. Therefore, please make sure to register your team before the closing date.

title: Practice Round
description: Your team can now attend the practice round session to sharpen your scripting skills and get a sneak peek into Bashaway 2023. This is great chance for you and your team to get a taste of the competition.

title: 1st Round
description: This is where the journey begins! You have to showcase your Scripting skills as you tackle various challenging tasks and pave your way to victory.

title: 2nd Round
description: This round is a bit more challenging compared to the first round. Therefore, make sure you and your team are prepared to face more complex problems and unleash your problem solving abilities.

title: Award Ceremony
description: The winners are selected from the final round and are presented with awards at the award ceremony. Bashaway 2023 comes to an end with a grand finale, celebrating the champions of the game.
